name: Blush Filter Soft Glow Liquid Blush
about: What it is:A lightweight liquid blush, with buildable pigments and finely milled micro-pearls, for a soft-focus, high-impact glow..Finish:Radiant.Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:The Blush Filter Soft Glow Liquid Blush formula has blendable pigments that effortlessly melt into the skin using its innovative doe-foot applicator for a long lasting dimensional u2018airblushedu2019 finish. The formula also includes a yummy candy scent to complement the sweet shade names.
ingredients: -Finely Milled Micro-Pearls: Provide a soft-focus, filtered finish...Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Hydrogenated Poly(C6-14 Olefin), Mica, Calcium Titanium Borosilicate, Octyldodecanol, Diisostearyl Malate, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Isododecane, Hydrogenated Styrene/Isoprene Copolymer, Silica, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Dextrin Palmitate, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Phenoxyethanol, Propylene Carbonate, Fragrance/Parfum, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Tin Oxide, Aluminum Hydroxide, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Tocopherol, Vanillin, Titanium Dioxide/Ci 77891, Iron Oxides/Ci 77491, Iron Oxides/Ci 77492, Iron Oxides/Ci 77499, Red 7 Lake/Ci 15850.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Add three dots of blush onto targeted areas with peanut-shaped doe foot. .-Blend with fingertips for a luminous glow...Hudau2019s hacks:.-Combine two shades for an ombre blush effect starting with three dots of the lightest shade at the center of the cheek. .-Add two dots of a darker shade higher up the cheekbone. .-Blend with fingers. .-Set with Easy Bake Loose Baking and Setting Powder (sold separately) for an u2018airblushedu2019 finish.
